Package org.twelve.entities

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.entities.Account
  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account​(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.util.List<Permissions> permissions,
               int accountID,
               java.lang.String location)
        Creates a new account to the system. The wishlist is initialized as an empty Arraylist.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of this account
        password - Password for this account
        permissions - What this account is allowed to do
        accountID - Unique identifier of this account
        location - The location of the user of this account

      • Account

        public Account​(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> wishlist,
               java.util.List<Permissions> permissions,
               int accountID,
               java.lang.String location)
        An overloaded constructor. Used to create accounts that already exist in the system.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of this account
        password - Password for this account
        wishlist - Wishlist that this account should be initialized with
        permissions - What this account is allowed to do
        accountID - Unique identifier of this account
        location - The location of this account

        Returns:
